translations: n.（Cha）人名；（柬）乍；（中）查（普通话·威妥玛）

phrs.translation: 恰恰, 倒角, 中国电信, 乍得
恰恰恰, 恰恰舞, 恰好恰, 叶倩文
车杜里, 后卫车斗里
恰恰恰, 恰恰, 石井明美, 恰好舞

sentences.sentence: The book Cha Jing was written by Lu Yu.
Later, people called the leaves that saved his life "Cha (tea)".
sentences.translation: 后来，人们把救了他一命的叶子叫做“茶”。

sentences.sentence: More than 4,000 years later, Lu Yu, "the saint of tea", mentioned Shen Nong in his book Cha Jing.
sentences.translation: 4000多年后，“茶圣”陆羽在他的著作《茶经》中提到了神农。
